jQuery notific8 demo

notific8 is a notification plug-in that was initially inspired by the notification style introduced in Windows 8. It is highly customizable and comes with multiple theme families built in. The Sass files can be included in a project for easy customizations.

Use the fields below to test the different options for the plug-in.

To see the onInit(data), onCreate(notification, data), and onClose(notification, data) actions functioning, open your browser's developer tools' console view.

(if checked, setting life below will be ignored)
Position
CSS Namespacenotific8 (default, only value available for the demo)
